alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 2:58PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Lander, west central Elko and northwestern Eureka Counties through 330 PM PDT... At 257 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms 9 miles north of Dunphy, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dunphy and North Area Mine. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County
